tooltipText: You become empowered by your last cast elemental ability. Your weapon combo finishers apply a stack of $effect:Status_BurningStat$, $effect:Status_Chilled$, or $effect:Status_Electrified$ to targets hit, based on your current empowerment. Additionally, your combo finishers reset the cooldown of Frostbolt, Fireball, and Lightning Strike.
name: Mage_ElementalEmpowerment
